articles.title: Saudi PhD student given 34 years in prison for retweeting dissidents
articles.description: Salma al-Shehab was accused of helping people who want to hurt national security. It shows MBS' crackdown on dissidents isn't stopping.

articles.author: Meredith Cash
articles.title: Brittney Griner: Russian penal colony resembles Gulag labor camps
articles.description: Direct descendants of the Soviet Union's Gulag system, Russian penal colonies are prison labor camps notorious for human rights abuses and corruption.

articles.title: Trump staffers focused more on securing big WH pics than docs: report
articles.description: Many remaining Trump staffers wanted souvenirs from the White House more than they wanted to properly sort documents, Politico reported.

articles.title: Videos show flooded streets of central Paris amid heavy storms
articles.description: Some metro stations received nearly one month's worth of rain within one hour, reported a French weather account run by volunteers.
